channel.title: Why wont my monsters fight back?
channel.description:
Ok im so tired of this, ive asked this many of times for quite a while (couple weeks) and no1 is able to answer my question, why the hell wont my npcs fight back?
If you attack them they just stand there, if you continue to click on them they hit you once but i need it to be a constant hit of lets say ever 3-4 seconds.
Why would they stand there? would it be something wrong in my npc handler?

item.title: Why wont my monsters fight back?
item.dc:creator: @Bloody_Wolf Bloody Wolf
item.description:
@Bloody_Wolf wrote:

backup your npc handler, then copy the other 1 that works correctly into your new 1?? haha idk if that will mess anything up, but thats why you back it up =D

Read full topic
item.source: Why wont my monsters fight back?

item.description:
@slim_2021 wrote:

well, ive been comparing my npc handler to one of a source that the monsters do fight back, and i cant seem to find any differences :s
